hero.title: About Dolphin Tours
hero.subtitle: Crafting magical marine experiences since our beginning

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Dolphin Tours is a licensed marine tourism company, recognized by maritime authorities with full safety certifications. Since our foundation, we have specialized in creating unforgettable ocean experiences ‚Äî from dolphin watching to whale encounters, and from snorkeling adventures to marine wildlife photography tours. We provide comprehensive services including safety equipment, professional guides, and personalized support from our dedicated marine experts.
story.p2: Today, Dolphin Tours is trusted by ocean enthusiasts across the region and beyond for our professionalism, marine expertise, and commitment to ocean conservation.

faq.title: Have Questions?
faq.subtitle: Here are some quick answers before you pack your bags

items.question: How can I book my dream trip?
items.answer: Booking is easy! Use our website, call our team, or drop us a message on WhatsApp or email ‚Äî we‚Äôll guide you every step of the way.

items.question: What‚Äôs included in the price?
items.answer: Our tours are designed to be stress-free: transport, stays, meals (as listed), expert guides, and activities ‚Äî all covered. No hidden surprises.

items.question: Can I design my own tour?
items.answer: Of course! Whether you want a romantic getaway, a family holiday, or an adventure-packed trip, we‚Äôll customize every detail for you.

items.question: What if I need to cancel?
items.answer: Life happens. That‚Äôs why our cancellation policies are flexible. Cancel up to 7 days before departure for a full refund ‚Äî no hassle.
